ui.playerViewErrorDetails: If the error still appears, ask the storyteller to create a new game.
ui.playerViewDetails: Open your camera and scan the QR code that the narrator will show you.
ui.name: Name
ui.tapCharacterExpandsExplanation: Tap a character or ability to make it larger and show it to other people

characters.c:werewolf_description: During the night, you vote someone to be killed with the other werewolves in secret.
characters.c:lone-werewolf_description: Same as @:c:werewolf_name but has to be the last werewolve alive when the werewolves win in order to win.
characters.c:nudist_description: Everyone knows that you are the nudist.
characters.c:seer_description: You can know the role of a player every night.
characters.c:suicide_description: If you get killed in the first voting session, you win. Otherwise, you become a regular villager.
characters.c:feral-kid_description: The first night, you choose your adoptive parent. You start as a villager, but when your parent dies, you become a werewolf.
characters.c:baker_description: Every night, you wake someone up and reveal your role in secret.
characters.c:triplet_description: You know who your siblings are.
characters.c:twin_description: You know who your siblings are.
characters.c:witch_description: Can save 1 person that got killed during the night before it finishes, also can kill 1 person at the end of the night. 1 usage of each.
characters.c:doctor_description: Can save 1 person that got killed during the night before it finishes. 1 usage.
characters.c:scarecrow_description: Can't be killed by the werewolves. If they try to kill him, his death won't be anounced on the next morning.
characters.a:beatboxer_description: During the night, practices beatbox so that villagers cannot hear noises.
characters.a:collejas_description: During the night, signals the storyteller who to slap on the back of the neck and with what power (from 1 to 5).

abilities.a:extra-life_description: When your death is announced, you can use the extra life and not die. 1 usage.
abilities.a:extra-vote_description: In one voting session, you can emit another vote. 1 usage.
abilities.a:cupid_description: The first night, you have to choose two players to fall in love. If one lover dies, the other also dies.
abilities.a:major_description: In case of a tie during the day, your vote defines the result. When a major dies, he chooses the next major, this way there's always a major.
abilities.a:reveal-ability_description: During the day, you can publicly reveal a player's ability. 1 usage.
abilities.a:extra-life-key_description: When a player with a {'"'}@:abilities.a:extra-life-lock_name{'"'} dies, you can revive him. 1 usage.
abilities.a:extra-life-lock_description: When you die, if a player with a {'"'}@:abilities.a:extra-life-key_name{'"'} wants to save you, you revive. 1 usage.
abilities.a:cancel-revive_description: When someone is reviced you can cancel it. 1 usage.
abilities.a:save-someone-else_description: When someone dies, you can save him. You cannot save yourself. 1 usage.
abilities.a:steal-ability_description: During the day, you can see 2 player's abilities and steal 1. 1 usage.
abilities.a:poison_description: During the day, you can publicly poison someone. That player is going to die at the next night's ending. 1 usage
abilities.a:protect_description: During the day, you can publicly protect someone against the werewolves. That player can't be killed by the werewolves the next night. 1 usage

actions.cupid-shoots_description: Chooses the lovers, he closes his eyes, and the lovers look at each other and memorize who's the other lover.
actions.feral-kid-chooses-parents_description: Picks and memorizes an adoptive parent.
actions.werewolves-meet_description: Just meet each other, no killing.
actions.seer-guesses_description: Points out a player and his character is shown.
actions.witch-kills-or-saves_description: Opens the eyes, the dead player is pointed out and signals if she wants to revive him (1 time). Then, can point out a player to kill (1 time).
actions.doctor-saves_description: Opens the eyes, the dead player is pointed out and signals if he wants to revive him (1 time).
actions.baker-gives-bread_description: Points a player, that player is woken up in secret, and he meets the baker.
